DefaultTemplateParameters.EMISSIVE_CODE: (A:CIRCUIT NAVCOM#ID# ON, Bool) (A:LIGHT POTENTIOMETER:#EMISSIVE_POTENTIOMETER#, percent over 100) * #DIMMING_FACTOR# *

UseTemplate.Name: ASOBO_GT_Switch_6States
UseTemplate.STATE0_TEST: (A:PILOT TRANSMITTER TYPE, Enum) 2 == (A:COPILOT TRANSMITTER TYPE, Enum) 2 == and
UseTemplate.STATE1_TEST: (A:PILOT TRANSMITTER TYPE, Enum) 1 == (A:COPILOT TRANSMITTER TYPE, Enum) 1 == and
UseTemplate.STATE2_TEST: (A:PILOT TRANSMITTER TYPE, Enum) 0 == (A:COPILOT TRANSMITTER TYPE, Enum) 0 == and
UseTemplate.STATE3_TEST: (A:PILOT TRANSMITTER TYPE, Enum) 0 == (A:COPILOT TRANSMITTER TYPE, Enum) 1 == and
UseTemplate.STATE4_TEST: (A:PILOT TRANSMITTER TYPE, Enum) 1 == (A:COPILOT TRANSMITTER TYPE, Enum) 0 == and
UseTemplate.STATE5_TEST: (A:PILOT TRANSMITTER TYPE, Enum) 4 == (A:COPILOT TRANSMITTER TYPE, Enum) 5 == and

UseTemplate.Name: ASOBO_GT_Switch_3States
UseTemplate.STATE0_TEST: (A:MARKER BEACON TEST MUTE, Enum) ! (A:MARKER BEACON SENSITIVITY HIGH, Bool) and
UseTemplate.STATE1_TEST: (A:MARKER BEACON TEST MUTE, Enum) ! (A:MARKER BEACON SENSITIVITY HIGH, Bool) ! and
UseTemplate.STATE2_TEST: (A:MARKER BEACON TEST MUTE, Enum) (A:MARKER BEACON SENSITIVITY HIGH, Bool) ! and

False.EMISSIVE_CODE: (A:CIRCUIT NAVCOM#ID# ON, Bool) (A:LIGHT POTENTIOMETER:#POTENTIOMETER#, percent over 100) * #BUTTON_EMISSIVE_FACTOR# *

UseTemplate.Name: ASOBO_GT_Emissive_Gauge
UseTemplate.EMISSIVE_CODE: (E:SIMULATION TIME, seconds) 2 * 1 % 0.5 < or (A:OUTER MARKER, Bool) and (A:MARKER BEACON TEST MUTE, bool) or

UseTemplate.Name: ASOBO_GT_Emissive_Gauge
UseTemplate.EMISSIVE_CODE: (E:SIMULATION TIME, seconds) sp0 l0 1 % 0.8 > l0 1 % 0.9 < and l0 1 % 0.5 < or (A:MIDDLE MARKER, Bool) and (A:MARKER BEACON TEST MUTE, bool) or

UseTemplate.Name: ASOBO_GT_Emissive_Gauge
UseTemplate.EMISSIVE_CODE: (E:SIMULATION TIME, seconds) 6 * 1 % 0.5 < or (A:INNER MARKER, Bool) and (A:MARKER BEACON TEST MUTE, bool) or
